I need a library of references
I need general info on the course in a general space (a reading list, schedule etc)
I need to be able to easily present my research (e.g. for an exam)
I need to be able to quickly capture ideas so that I don’t have to think about it anymore
I need to be able to restructure in order for the research to evolve
I need to be able to store everything in one place so that I can find it easily
I need to be able to structure in order to get an overview
I need to be in control of who has access so that I feel comfortable to try out things
I need to be able to see everything at once in order to find focus
I need the platform to be very accessible / easy to use so that I can easily incorporate it in my daily routine
I need to be able to get feedback from others (peers/mentors/externals) in order to learn
I need to be able to start over with a blank page in order for the research to evolve
I need the platform to complement the tools I already use (not to be a third inbox)
I need to be able to see my research (material) from a different angle in order for it to evolve (a.i. perspective)
I need to be able to revisit my previous thoughts in order to look at it from a different perspective
I need to be able to see what has been done before in order to build on the past
I need to be able to organise my material in different visual ways (a wall, stream, grid…)
I need to be able to give feedback on others
I need to have full control on how my research looks
